title: Type ID: Slab serif with open bowl on R
content:
This looks very familiar but I can't seem to put my finger on it.

Thanks for all your help.  
Michael

comments.content: Hmmm, does look close eh. I have a feeling that the type wasn't modified that much though, if any.
